column2: My liege has a child in need of a guardian and mentor...

column2: My liege, I hope fate finds you well! A child needs a proper guardian, and nothing would please me more than to offer my services as a mentor and tutor, if it pleases thee.\nYour humble vassal\n[From.GetTitledFirstName]

column2: My dear [This.GetTitle], your offer is most reasonable. We trust the child will be safe in your hands and will receive a proper upbringing. May our friendship last forever!\n[From.GetTitledFirstName]

column2: My dear [This.GetTitle], your offer is deeply appreciated. However, we have someone else in mind as a guardian for our child. Peace be with you!\n[From.GetTitledFirstName]
